attributes.action: abolish the free swim as those who genuinely use the pool as a form of exercise can no longer gain easy access to the pool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Part of the Governments thinking behind the 'free swim' was to inspire children to become the next Olympic hope. If they wanted to achieve this surely a better option would be to make the Swim Clubs free. As part of the club they would be tutored and trained.
All the free swim initiative has created is overcrowded swimming baths, full of cavorting children.
Unless at the 2012 Olympics they intend to host events such as Handstands in shallow water, Synchronised verbal abuse or The running bomb at the deep end, then Britain will not gain the medals in the pool which the government believe this scheme will bring.
I have witnessed the aforementioned events on numerous occasions at my local swimming baths in Braintree Essex. 
Problems the free swim has caused = Overcrowding, Prolonged waiting times, Time restrictions in the pool, Increased risk of injury, reduced income for council run pools due to cancelled membership. 
We just want to pay our money and be able to swim when we desire.
